articles.description: Jude Bellingham's last-gasp equaliser spares England a second successive Wembley defeat after defensive errors threatened to prove costly in the friendly against Belgium.
articles.title: Late Bellingham goal rescues draw for England

articles.description: Rob Page's Wales miss out on Euro 2024 after a crushing penalty shootout defeat against Poland in their play-off final at Cardiff City Stadium.
articles.title: Wales miss out on Euros after Poland shootout defeat

articles.description: Conor Bradley's first Northern Ireland goal drains more life out of Scotland's Euro 2024 preparations by extending their winless run to seven games.
articles.title: Bradley's first NI goal extends Scotland's winless run

articles.description: The Euros provide a golden chance for an England's masters of the missed opportunity to win their first major trophy since 1966
articles.title: 'England have golden chance to win Euros - time for excuses is over'

articles.description: Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for New Zealand Women v England Women in the Women's International Twenty20 Match on BBC Sport.
articles.title: New Zealand Women v England Women - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: Part tennis, part squash, padel is the fast-growing sport popular with celebrities and sports stars.
articles.title: Padel: ‘Living the dream as Britain’s best player’

articles.description: When the lights go out, a Formula 1 driver is alone - apart from one connection. Their race engineer is their guide, strategist and psychologist.
articles.title: Fear, faith, friendship: Inside F1’s most precious relationship

articles.description: West Ham midfielder Lucas Paqueta scores a late penalty as Brazil draw 3-3 with Spain in a friendly at Real Madrid's Bernabeu.
articles.title: Paqueta's late penalty earns Brazil draw with Spain

articles.description: Zherdan Shaqiri scores the winner as the Republic of Ireland fall to a narrow 1-0 defeat by Euro 2024-bound Switzerland in a low-key friendly in Dublin.
articles.title: Shaqiri scores as Switzerland beat Republic of Ireland

articles.description: WP Nel is hailed as "among the best props to play for Scotland" after it was announced he will retire at the end of the season.
articles.title: Scotland & Edinburgh prop Nel to retire in summer
